website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive, durable, and loaded with an array of built-in features to make your next cookout a little easier on the chef, this grill gazebo is worth your consideration.
cons: While it’s fairly straightforward to assemble, the included instructions aren’t particularly useful

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for!!! It's worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: (Like) It was easy to assemble, (Dislike) Stakes wouldn't hold my 3 yr old granddaughter down. Lol, but I ordered the cork screw stakes to keep it from flying away in the wind. Great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great and survived High winds easy.
customer_reviews.text: Though I didn't get this as a grill gazebo, I got it as a shelter for our outside lot actors at our haunter house, it withstood 50-70 mph gusts of wind and stood strong, our actors couldn't be happier having this shelter from the few rainy nights we get. Great product that has fit right into the correct size place.
customer_reviews.author: R. Solley

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BBQ CANOPY
customer_reviews.text: Just love this, was easy to put together, although the top was tough to stretch on! We have had it up since I got it and it's great! Shade when I BBQ in the sun, keeps me dry if it's raining!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Collier

customer_reviews.title: Decent purchase
customer_reviews.text: At this price point,Overall, I like this item . I could see this lasting 4-5 years which at the price paid isn’t too bad.like many Chinese made items , the assembly instructions are not ideal. You need to make sure the 4 legs are assembled in proper direction, so you able to attach shelves to outside later in process( holes for shelf facing out).everthing else went togeather well . Big issue is packing . Many areas were paint is chipped from lack of protective packing material you will most likely need to touch up many areas with black paint to prevent rust.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! It's easy to put together and so far
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! It's easy to put together and so far, it's pretty sturdy. The only issue was that a few parts arrived scuffed and scratched, which is not something you like to see when you bus something new, but I kind of expected it because that was what all the other reviews said. Overall, aside from the minor scrapes and scratches on the paint, it is a nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Janet H.

customer_reviews.title: This does work for my needs and looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: This does work for my needs and looks just like the picture. I gave 3 stars due to one pole is little bit bent, one of the holes on the top of another pole is too big so had to jerry rig with plumbers tape to get the screw to work at all and it was impossible to fit the top on with two people. Having to call in some help to get the cover to go on the roof pole. Price wise it’s a good deal and I don’t expect to last more than a couple of years because I live in a mild climate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart before my eyes
customer_reviews.text: Have had the gazebo for about 8 months or so. And I rated it a 2 star because it is falling apart on me. The welds are very week. As can be seen in the pictures the cross supports are already rusted and falling out. The fabric is not UV protected and fades FAST. See the color difference in the pictures. I live in the Midwest and I don't get blazing sun every day. No stainless steel on this thing at all. So it will eventually rust away. For the price I guess I expected it to last more than once season. Maybe 2. But It looks like it'll last season and that's it. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: AdamDH

customer_reviews.title: Nice! Looks just like the photo.
customer_reviews.text: VERY attractive - all nuts and bolts were there. Good directions. Only a few four letter words uttered by significant other during assembly :) Great quality. We are really happy with the way it looks in our yard. .
customer_reviews.author: PaisleyBooks

customer_reviews.title: like it, maybe would have like it to be a little larger
customer_reviews.text: nice, I like it, only trouble putting it together was getting the top on, which is good, it is quite tight. Have a 2 sided grill, fits , but I would have liked more room on the sides and maybe more depth to keep out of the sprinkles, but it does work keeping the metal of the grill cooler to the touch
customer_reviews.author: dummy customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for me as intended
customer_reviews.text: Assembly instructions were simply small drawings. Larger drawings plus some written instructions would have made for a better experience. Despite the marketing materials I securely fastened the gazebo to a concrete patio. Recently it went through the winds of a Nor-Easterner without a problem. Wish it was a bit larger; not big enough to keep me dry in any thing but a drizzle.
customer_reviews.author: ComputerGuy

customer_reviews.title: Great piece for price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Fits our charbroil dual grill with smoker. Love the grate type sides to put drinks on. I probably should have bought a little bit bigger personally but you can get two chairs under it while u grill. I think it's great because you can stay in the shade, grill and people can relax and talk near you. It could have used another set of anchor pins.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Aikey

customer_reviews.title: two person assembly absolutely required
customer_reviews.text: It is just the right size to straddle our hot tub for a little shade. Assembly is okay as long as you read directions first and make sure you have a second person to help. It is a little more lightweight than I had hoped. We had to lay it down during the last wind storm and put it back up after the winds died down.
customer_reviews.author: PJM

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase decision!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and with no damage. Impressive quality for the price, more sturdy than I feared. Complete acceptable for a Texas summer. Assembly took me about an hour and was no more difficult than I expected. Instructions say requires two people, but I did it alone with no trouble. I’ve used the included footings to attach to my patio with concrete anchors, and in the past 10 days since delivery it’s survived two hefty storms with extreme winds with no damage.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Father’s Day and wanted to have it up when he got home from work. I’m a small 5’1” female and did this by myself in about two hours. Super easy to put together. I had to tug a little with the fabric, but that’s to be expected as it needs to fit tightly. I will be bolting to the deck, but waiting to power wash and repaint. It’s sturdy and so far- I’m loving it!
customer_reviews.author: scrabblewhiz

customer_reviews.title: Great gazebo. Nice looks. Good value.
customer_reviews.text: This gazebo is perfect for keeping our outdoor bar sink protected. It was easy to put together and looks great! It just survived a huge storm that downed trees in our seasonal campground. We made sure it was staked down and it withstood high winds and lots of falling branches and pine cones! The only thing I don't like is that anything on the side shelves gets wet.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L.

customer_reviews.title: The canopy top is useless.
customer_reviews.text: The frame is nice but the canopy top is useless against and weather. It is so thin you can see through it and rain runs through it and pools on it into puddles. It is so thin and lose, really good for nothing. I would suggest looking elsewhere is you are looking to protect your grill.
customer_reviews.author: Budd

customer_reviews.title: Bottom pole damaged but nice gazebo
customer_reviews.text: Nice gazebo for bbq the only thing one of the bottom poles was bent inwards frame poles weak we got it bent back enough without breaking it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: make sure all the parts are in the box
customer_reviews.text: It was missing hardware but rather then that its nice and they won't just send you the hardware you have to take the hole thing apart to return it so that sucks
customer_reviews.author: anthony

customer_reviews.title: This gazebo is really getting some use
customer_reviews.text: Keeps rain off the grill and shades the big window in the eat-in kitchen. We've been using it all summer and so far it's holding up like a champ and was WAY cheaper than the identical model with a different brand name from Lowe's. I'm happy with it for sure.
customer_reviews.author: GunNut37086

customer_reviews.title: Great but
customer_reviews.text: Love it, the fabric cover was a little hard to put on, but besides that I’m satisfied with my purchase so far
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price for this!
customer_reviews.text: We've had it assembled in our backyard for a few months. It went together quickly and is very sturdy, especially for the $116 price. We saw one just like it at a local big box store for $199.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dent and bent upon arrival
customer_reviews.text: All of the legs were either bent or had dents. Other connecting pieces had dents and flaws. The package of screws had missing nuts that were needed for assembly. Disappointed in the condition when it arrived. The directions were not easy to follow.
customer_reviews.author: laura harris

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy item; roof does NOT fit and I almost broke my finger trying to install the roof
customer_reviews.text: Item is sturdy and was fairly easy to assemble. I did it alone and it took about 90 minutes. However, the roof does not stretch enough to fit the poles that hold it. I almost broke my finger trying to assemble that part of it. I gave up on trying to stretch the material to fit the 4th corner and plan to contact the manufacturer to see if they will send a top that actually fits the structure.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Guess you get what you pay for. Think this is a lucky if it’s gonna last a year
customer_reviews.author: karl b

customer_reviews.title: AVOID THIS GAZEBO!
customer_reviews.text: Pieces started to fall off the 1st week! Awful quality but the manufacturer did issue a full refund upon return.
customer_reviews.author: Roseann

customer_reviews.title: The picture you have to use to put it together because there is no instructions structure
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of it but it is not sturdy it's not steel bar it is a bar that bends very easily the wind came through and it broke the top part that holds on the cover I fixed it but had to move it from that location. Girl has completely broken apart I can no longer usable.
customer_reviews.author: Joy to the world

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were incredibly awful. The bad images are hard to read and out of order as far as steps go. However, once it's together it works quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Sports Nut

customer_reviews.title: Package destroyed, missing bolts!
customer_reviews.text: Great gazebo perfect size for my grill. 3 stars because package came destroyed, missing bolts and had broken glass inside which is odd since there is no glass on this product. If i didnt work in construction and just happened to have the right size bolts laying around it would have been unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Greenfield II

customer_reviews.title: Looks nicer than I expected, not as sturdy as I expected
customer_reviews.text: The finishing and welds on it are horrible, but once assembled it looks pretty nice. There are literally no instructions, but a series of 8 pictures. Although it's not particularly difficult to put together. I hope it holds up
customer_reviews.author: Megan G

customer_reviews.title: You will love this.
customer_reviews.text: I love this grill gazebo. It looks great in my yard, I can grill in the rain, and it is just really awesome!! No downsides!
customer_reviews.author: KM Montegue

customer_reviews.title: Block UV
customer_reviews.text: I just love it, definitely blocks out the heat of the sun. A real plus for me! I can’t be in the sun! I use it on my back porch so I can sit outside!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only good for shade from sun.
customer_reviews.text: This gazebo is good if you want protection from the sun. If it rains, forget it. Rain seeps thru the roof and everything underneath is wet. I would not tell a friend to get this item.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Litvay

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: Put in over the grill. It was easy to assemble. The price was good!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Vespa

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition to the yard
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Keeps the bbq’er nice and covered when grilling dinner for family!
customer_reviews.author: MsMychell

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF.
customer_reviews.text: This product is no to bad. The only MAJOR problem is that the rain goes right through the canopy. Very thin fabric. Last 1 I bought was completely water proof. And cost less. The canopy only has 4 points of structure . Had to use parts from my old one so when it snows it will not collapse Would not recommend if you like to grill A lot. Even in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: jonathan springer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Gazebo!
customer_reviews.text: Love this gazebo for our San Diego patio! Does the job and keeps the sun off a portion of our patio and allows the ability to be able to relax outside while my son plays in our little pool. Very elegant looking as well.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It is sturdy and useful. It is great,easy up and received very fast. Enjoyed already
customer_reviews.author: Keith Bowles

customer_reviews.title: Good grill canopy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not as sturdy as one I bought from Lowe's a few years ago, but so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing items
customer_reviews.text: I am missing bolts for the second shelf very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Send back gazebo tar bad quality could see right through it
customer_reviews.text: Send back gazebo tar bad quality could see right through it
customer_reviews.author: marta arce

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well designed
customer_reviews.text: Product is very appealing and sturdy. Love the hooks, shelves and roof design.
customer_reviews.author: bbaran

customer_reviews.title: Husband Likes it
customer_reviews.text: Price is right. Easy to assemble. Husband pleased. Mission accomplished.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene

customer_reviews.title: Organized grilling
customer_reviews.text: This gazebo has been so nice! We are enjoying it greatly.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Keeps sun off
customer_reviews.text: Brought for my husband to use on his grilling area and he loved it
customer_reviews.author: Mrs M

customer_reviews.title: buy better quality for more durability
customer_reviews.text: Already showing rust at joints. Canopy caught rain and stretched. Wish I'd bought better quality.
customer_reviews.author: choc

customer_reviews.title: Did NOT get everything as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I received this very quick. Assembly was easy. I did NOT receive the hooks for hanging additional cooking essentials.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt B.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: bottle opener was upside down. Other than that it is very sturdy and relatively easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Sean McGrath

customer_reviews.title: A gift for my Grandson and he loves it, ...
customer_reviews.text: A gift for my Grandson and he loves it, we live in Oregon , lots of rain , he cooks outside a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Swanna Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Great tent
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tent for the price. Well made and easy to put together! There were a few missing parts and damaged parts for the shelf but the manufacturer promised to ship replacements
customer_reviews.author: Fred Nintzel

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Bought less than 7 months ago. Welds are broke on the arches and top.
customer_reviews.author: SD buyer

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Unexpected high quality. Goes together well with perfect area coverage. Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald D. Ross

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy but good stakes as the ones that come with it are not adequate
customer_reviews.text: Gazebo looked great but swayed in the wind and only lasted a month till it blew over and frame twisted up on us. Should have bought better stakes , ones that come with it diddnt hold up. Loved this gazebo disappointed it diddnt last long
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: with wife only took about an hour to put together. On a real windy day make sure it is anchored good as the top likes to fly lol
customer_reviews.author: Edward Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Great price, great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great price and easy to assemble. Not crazy about the color but it works because it is neutral enough.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Gandy

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Product is exactly what you pay for. It does the job for now but it certainly won’t last forever. Huge dent on one pole (see pic) that was very disappointing. But not worth dismantling and returning.
customer_reviews.author: Spero Hatzidakis

customer_reviews.title: Worthless..
customer_reviews.text: our garden canopy is worthless the iron top broke off in the first wind had no luck in trying to replace it .
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Haberland

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Great product besides the fact that the screws started rusting about 3 days after assembling.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Phillipson

customer_reviews.title: Came with minor damage
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice BBQ gazebo but it came with some damage. Part of the frame was bent in shipping. For the cost, timing and use it wasn't worth returning but it defiantly dropped the rating.
customer_reviews.author: Do

customer_reviews.title: Will not last one Season
customer_reviews.text: I bought this gazebo tent in March for a grill cover. The canopy is not holding up and already needs replacing. Very disappointed in this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: It's not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Covering stretch out and holds water, my time and money is wasted on this product, im very disappointed about this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marvin B.

customer_reviews.title: Similar Grill Gazebos are much more expensive
customer_reviews.text: I love this Gazebo. great construction, easy to assemble. looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: great item
customer_reviews.text: easy as pie to put together. Its very sturdy. Great looking item.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Canopy is tight but fits well
customer_reviews.text: Put together with grandpa. It works well on porch but tied down due to frequent winds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: That it lasts for more than one season
customer_reviews.text: It fits the need but not really heavy duty. I worry how it will stand up throughout the winter.
customer_reviews.author: Arlene M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this.
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price. Pretty easy to assemble. Looks great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item for the outdoor bbq.
customer_reviews.text: The gazebo is just what I wanted, holds up to the wind, make sure you anchor it!
customer_reviews.author: Connie Stover

customer_reviews.title: Nice Bbq cover
customer_reviews.text: Nice, but buy some weights. It is no too sturdy in the wind. I applied scotchgard on the stitching of the cover to help with water proofing.
customer_reviews.author: Ronengelhardt

customer_reviews.title: Missing a part
customer_reviews.text: love the item That we are missing two of the number 10 arm bars to hold a little trays up on the side. Can someone please send us two more or how do we take care of this
customer_reviews.author: mike karlgaard

customer_reviews.title: seems very durable
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and quality of product. Used for our outdoor grill
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Renshaw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy - attractive - easy to assemble - good value
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't handle the rain.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and was easy to assemble. BUT, the first time we had a hard rain, the right side of the canopy warped and FILLED with water. Had to use a stick to dump out the water and prop it up so it wouldn't fill up again. I can tell this is going to happen every time it rains now because the canvas is stretched out and sagging now.
customer_reviews.author: Wendie D.

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: The gazebo is decient for the price but Missing parts.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Nolan, MS, RD, HCSM/HFI

customer_reviews.title: This is gray not black or brown.
customer_reviews.text: The frame is not black. The frame is gray unless there was a problem in manufacturing with the one shipped to me. Be careful, you will have to pay for the shipping back to them and that's more than this product costs. This looks alot like the Sunjoy 8'x 5' Soft Top Grill Gazebo, it is not nearly the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Steve B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sturdy and I put it together myself in less then 90 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Sean McGuire

product_meta.title: GOJOOASIS Barbecue Grill Gazebo Outdoor 2-Tier BBQ Canopy Tent Coffee Shelter 8-Feet
feature_bullets: Rust- resistant powder coated steel frame Barbecue Gazebo Tent - 8 feet high,5 feet wide
BBQ Grill Gazebo Tent with Strong 180g polyester with a fire retardant treatment fabric
Double-tier top cover design not only looks good but is designed to make Good ventilating
Safe flame-resistant top canopy with Water and UV resistant function for long lasting use
Gojooasis BBQ Grill Tent include 1 crafted bottle opener & 2 iron meshes table & 7 Pegs on the frame & 1 hook on the middle top, put up fan, lights and so on

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars272 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
